intro: The <2>First React conference</2> for Spanish speakers <6>in Latin America</6>
ruta_n_city: Complejo Ruta N Calle 67 Nº 52-20, Medellín - Colombia
about_us_description: We are the first React conference for Spanish speakers in Latin America. This is an event by the community to the community! Come and find the latest knowledge and awesome experiences around React in Medellín, Colombia.
sponsors_subtitle: This wonderful event is posible thanks to this amazing companies
speakers_subtitle: We are honored to have such a great initial lineup.
team_subtitle: Brought to you by these awesome folks
how_to_get_here_description: You'll arrive to <2>Jose María Cordoba (MDE) Airport</2> which is just 25 minutes away from Medellín by Taxi/Uber.
where_to_stay_description: We recommend you these hotels in <1>El Poblado</1>
how_to_get_to_the_conference_title: How to get to the Conference
how_to_get_to_the_conference_description: Medellín offers a metro system that will take you to the <2>Universidad Station</2> that is just at 5 minute walk to the Venue in around 10 minutes from <5>Poblado Station</5>
have_questions_description: Shoot us a DM <1>@reactlaconf</1> or send us an email to <3>reactconfcolombia@gmail.com</3>
